subject: EVP Analysis Request
author: therealrobstone
full_text:
I am new to the group and have an EVP I want an opinion on. The file is 
posted on the folder ROB STONE'S FILES. Not sure what the "voice" is.

If anyone has time to take a listen I would greatly appreciate it.

Thanks for your help.

Regards,

Rob Stone

Fort Wayne, Indiana
